column4: I bought a computer in the summer that qualified for the Windows Upgrade Offer, and now I dual boot it with win7 and Ubuntu. Would that cause any issues with the upgrade process? I asked this in the Windows channel and they said to try asking here.
No, not unless you did not have enough space in the partition.
You shouldn't have a problem upgrading from windows 7 to windows 8 on the same partition unless your running low on space.
It's on a different partition your not upgrading on the ubuntu partition.
